learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Lifestyles and Routines vocabulary
Apply B2 Present Simple vs Continuous, Stative Verbs structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: I ______ (think) about moving to London lately.

content.stimulus_en: Does she ______ (belong) to any sports club?
